title: Runes error
body: Basically says unknown error has occured when i try and buy anything from Tier 3

replies.body: We're looking into this now!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further and help you out directly.

"An Error has occurred.
You have reached the maximum amount for this item. Please reach out to support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for further assistance"
